intro: Scolopia minutiflora, commonly known as the small-flowered scolopia, is a perennial herb native to the southeastern United States. Scolopia minutiflora thrives in moist, shady environments and is often found in woodlands and along stream banks. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and botanical study.
